entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 40%
entry.summary: Light snow ending early this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 24. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 22 by morning.
